contest-event.event-date:
June 25, 1955 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Pittencrieff Park, Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland, UK Open Contest Champions: Bowhill Colliery FCBA 'A Band' Champions: Bowhill Colliery Best section 2 band - Cowdenbeath. Best section 3 band - Lochgelly Public. Best section 4 band - Stoneyburn and District. 16 bands competed.
Nov. 7, 2011, 4:18 p.m. March 31, 2013, 9:04 p.m.
1 Bowhill Colliery and District Silver Band Drake Rimmer
2 Alloa Burgh Charles Telfer
3 Lochgelly Band Albert Badrick
4 Renfrew Burgh Band John Peckham
